aadhaar-sc-post-count: days since Supreme Court announced it would form Constitutional Bench for hearing Aadhaar - Privacy case.
aadhaar-sc-since: Since 11 Aug 2015, several cases related Aadhaar Privacy has been waiting for formation of a constitutional bench.
aadhaar-sc-cji: 2 Chief Justices of India have retired since without forming the constitutional bench.
